title: Write Code
description: Develop new features and ensure code quality.

title: Test App
description: Perform unit testing and verify application functionality.

title: Refactor Code
description: Optimize the existing codebase for better performance.

title: Review PR
description: Check the pull request for code quality and provide feedback.

title: Deploy App
description: Deploy the latest version of the app to the production environment.

title: Fix Bug
description: Resolve reported bugs and issues in the system.

title: Update Docs
description: Update the project documentation to reflect recent changes.

title: Create UI
description: Design and implement new user interface components.

title: Plan Sprint
description: Organize the tasks and goals for the upcoming sprint.

title: Debug Issue
description: Identify and fix performance bottlenecks in the application.

title: Design Logo
description: Create a new logo for the branding of the product.

title: Optimize Performance
description: Improve application load time and responsiveness.

title: Implement Feature
description: Add a new feature based on client requirements.

title: Set Up CI/CD
description: Configure continuous integration and deployment pipelines.

title: Run Tests
description: Execute automated tests to ensure system stability.

title: Check Logs
description: Review server logs for errors or unusual activity.

title: Research Topic
description: Investigate new technologies and trends relevant to the project.

title: Sync with Team
description: Hold a meeting to align on the current progress and next steps.

title: Review Design
description: Evaluate the latest UI/UX designs for feedback and improvements.

title: Analyze Data
description: Examine user data and analytics to inform product decisions.
